quote: I wish I loved the Human Race;I wish I loved its silly face;I wish I liked the way it walks;I wish I liked the way it talks;And when I’m introduced to one,I wish I thought “What Jolly Fun!
quote_letters: I WISH I LOVED THE HUMAN RACEI WISH I LOVED ITS SILLY FACEI WISH I LIKED THE WAY IT WALKSI WISH I LIKED THE WAY IT TALKSAND WHEN IM INTRODUCED TO ONEI WISH I THOUGHT WHAT JOLLY FUN
